name: Tourist 3D Bus Coach Simulator
description:
Tourist 3D Bus Coach Simulator:
This Game environment is a real scene in the Pakistan country.people come here for visit this place all over the Pakistan and from foreign countries.Here you can see Beautiful place and natural beauty.Tourist bus simulator is a mountain journey for every one.First of all you select the bus then drive it.Bus drive on hill is a good adventure for you.This game reflect the tour from one city to a mountain climb.Here you can really enjoy a lot of bus journey on the climb road.Beautiful scenery on bank of the road.
Game Feature:
Realistic Historical Place.
Stunning HD Graphics.
Realistic Sound Effect.
Smooth Control of Bus drive.
Multiple of bus model.
